trans-unit.source: Provides access to information received by the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> class when accepting WebSocket connections.
trans-unit.target: 在接受 WebSocket 连接时提供对 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 类接收的信息的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cookies received by the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object in the WebSocket opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WebSocket 起始握手中的 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象接收的 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The cookies received by the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象接收的 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTTP headers received by the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object in the WebSocket opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WebSocket 起始握手中的 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象接收的 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP headers received by the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 对象接收的 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the WebSocket client is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示是否对 WebSocket 客户端进行身份验证的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the WebSocket client is authenticated; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WebSocket 客户端未经过身份验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the WebSocket client connected from the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 WebSocket 客户端是否从本地计算机进行连接的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the WebSocket client connected from the local machine; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WebSocket 客户端从本地计算进行连接，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the WebSocket connection is secured using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).
trans-unit.target: 获取指示是否使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 保护 WebSocket 连接的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the WebSocket connection is secured using SSL; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 SSL 保护 WebSocket 连接，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the Origin HTTP header included in the WebSocket opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WebSocket 打开握手中包含的原始 HTTP 标题的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Origin HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 原始 HTTP 标头的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI requested by the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WebSocket 客户端请求的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI requested by the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 客户端请求的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header included in the WebSocket opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WebSocket 打开握手中包含的 SecWebSocketKey HTTP 标题的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the SecWebSocketKey HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: SecWebSocketKey HTTP 标头的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of the Secure WebSocket protocols included in the WebSocket opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WebSocket 起始握手中包含的安全 WebSocket 协议的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The list of the Secure WebSocket protocols.
trans-unit.target: 安全 WebSocket 协议的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of sub-protocols requested by the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 WebSocket 客户端请求的子协议的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The list of sub-protocols requested by the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 客户端请求的子协议的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于获取标识、身份验证信息和 WebSocket 客户的安全角色的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" />。

trans-unit.source: The identity, authentication information, and security roles for the WebSocket client.
trans-unit.target: 标识、身份验证信息和 WebSocket 客户端的安全角色。

trans-unit.source: Gets the WebSocket instance used to send and receive data over the WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于通过 WebSocket 连接发送和接收数据的 WebSocket 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />。

trans-unit.source: The WebSocket instance.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 实例。
